committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to extend the authorization for the Upper Delaware Citizens Advisory Council for an additional ten years.

summary.text: Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to extend the authorization of the Upper Delaware Citizens Advisory Council for an additional ten years.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization for the Upper Delaware Citizens Advisory Council for an additional ten years.
